casebody.data:
MANGUS v. A. C. E. FREIGHT, INC., et al. No. 1260,

Mise.

Decided March 27, 1967. Louis A. Dirker for petitioner. Bruce B. Laybourne for respondent Freight Drivers, Dockworkers & Helpers, Local Union No. 24. Per Curiam.

The motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and the petition for a writ of certiorari are.granted. The judgment is vacated and the case is remanded to the Supreme Court of Ohio for further consideration in light of Vaca v. Sipes, ante, p. 171.
